<h3 id="X38315">X(38315)&nbsp;=&nbsp; X(1)X(6)&cap;X(2)X(5846)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(3*a^2+a*b+2*b^2+a*c+2*c^2) : :
<b><br>
X(38315) = 2*X(1)+X(6),X(1)+2*X(1386),4*X(1)-X(3242),5*X(1)+X(3751),7*X(1)+2*X(4663),X(1)+5*X(16491),7*X(1)-X(16496),X(6)-4*X(1386),2*X(6)+X(3242),5*X(6)-2*X(3751),7*X(6)-4*X(4663),X(6)-10*X(16491),7*X(6)+2*X(16496),X(8)-4*X(3589),X(67)-4*X(11735),X(69)-7*X(3622),2*X(125)+X(32298),2*X(141)-5*X(3616),X(145)+5*X(3618),2*X(182)+X(1482) (and many others)
</b>
<p>
See Kadir Altintas and Ercole Suppa, <a href="https://groups.io/g/euclid/message/856"><b>Euclid 856 </b></a>.
</p>
<p>
X(38315) lies on these lines: {1,6}, {2,5846}, {8,3589}, {10,4989}, {31,17599}, {55,5096}, {56,1631}, {67,11735}, {69,3622}, {81,17024}, {100,17025}, {105,28895}, {125,32298}, {141,3616}, {145,3618}, </p>
<p>
X(38315) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1,16475}, {5050,10247}, {7967,14853} <br>
X(38315) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (6,16475), (10516,5886), (16475,1386), (21358,25055), (31884,3576) <br>
X(38315) = X(513)-he conjugate of X(1054) <br>
X(38315) = crosssum of X(1) and X(7174) <br>
X(38315) = barycentric product X(i)*X(j) for these (i,j): (1,29598), (72,31918) <br>
X(38315) = trilinear product X(i)*X(j) for these (i,j): (6,29598), (71,31918) <br>
X(38315) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,6,3242), (1,1001,16777), (1,1386,6), (1,3246,16672), (1,7290,37), (1,11370,7968), (1,11371,7969), (1,16469,7174), (1,16478,958), (1,16491,1386), (1,16667,3243), (1,18991,5605), (1,18992,5604), (31,29819,17599), (81,17024,17597), (614,3745,37674), (1100,16972,6), (1125,3416,3763), (4682,5272,37682), (7968,7969,9575), (16666,36404,6), (17017,17469,55), (17716,29821,1376), (26230,33070,30811)<br>
</p>
